title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Should Bivol be getting more respect
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Should Bivol be getting more respect
description:
Keith Idec is back this week and talks with Chris about last weekend's Canelo-Bivol fight and talks about if Bivol should be getting more respect for his win, should Canelo still be considered the best pound-for-pound boxer, and what we can expect from this weekend's fight between Charlo-Castano. Later, Jaron "Boots" Ennis stops by to talk about his upcoming fight and where he ranks himself as a pound-for-pound boxer. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
